## Bio

I am a dedicated Machine Learning Engineer with a robust academic foundation and a profound dedication to ethical AI advancement. Actively engaged in pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science, my passion lies in crafting AI solutions that contribute positively to society.

Possessing a creative problem-solving orientation, I constantly seek inventive approaches to alleviate biases and enhance transparency in machine learning algorithms. Committed to the development of responsible and impactful AI, I bring a unique combination of technical prowess, fervor, and adaptability to complex projects.

**Interests:** Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Equity and Inclusivity, Responsible AI, Information Retrieval,Reinforcement Learning and Computational Linguistics.

## Inquiries

If you have questions about my work or are interested in collaborating, feel free to [contact me](mailto:kigaye.ericpeter@gmail.com). I am always interested in discussing data science workshop offerings.

## Mentorship

I actively seek opportunities to join mentorship groups and guide fellow young researchers in their scientific careers. Please [reach out via email](mailto:kigaye.ericpeter@gmail.com).
